Text:
video quality fine, thx for the upload..... it's in FLV format, VLC media player plays it perfectly... 

My only gripe however...

Why did you feel the need to split this into 7 different parts ?? Makes viewing slightly difficult!!
well i only do it because i have low bandwidth. and if it is in parts seeding becomes easy..  well i can combine it in single file too . if anybody has more opinion please suggest
